1: Look! How good and how pleasant it is when brothers truly live in unity.[c]
2: It is like fine oil poured on the head, which flows down the beard[d]— Aaron's beard, and then flows down his garments.[e]
3: It is like the dew of Hermon,[f] which flows down upon the hills of Zion.[g] Indeed,[h] that is where the Lord has decreed a blessing will be available—eternal life.[i]
